General.Name: Moorim Paper
General.Description: Moorim Paper Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells paper products. It offers printing papers, such as art and white papers; and produces and sells bleach chemical pulps. The company also engages in the installment financing, and facility rental businesses; and wholesale of paper and pulp products. In addition, it produces and sells steam and electricity. The company was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Jinju, South Korea.
